item.title: [Kafka] Running Kafka with Docker (python)
item.author: Youhee
item.description: Kafka with Docker In this post, we would like to go over how to run Kafka with Docker and Python. Before starting the post, make sure you have installed Docker (Docker hub) on your computer. Step 1. Docker Image Setup Okay, first, let’s create a directory folder to store docker-compose.yml file. The docker-compose file does not run your code itself. 1 $ mkdir ~/docker-kafka && cd docker-kafka You can pull kafka and zookeeper images by using this docker pull command, more detailed explanation can be found in the following link - kafka and zookeeper from Docker Hub.
